entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unexpected Parent component rerendering #46044
  • [AOT] Clean up AOT warnings in the SPA Proxy project #46036
  • Perf improvement: json, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter, stage1publishaot #46035
  • Design proposal: Localization with multiple assemblies at the same time #46034
  • Incorrect target framework for Microsoft.Extensions.Diagnostics.HealthChecks.EntityFrameworkCore #46030
  • Blazor WASM PWA app published to github pages - PWA not working, errors in console, cannot access .json file #46027
  • Opaque - reference token validation #46026
  • .NET 7 Blocker - Method get_ServerSideSessions in type ApiAuthorizationDbContext from assembly IdentityServer does not have an implementation #46025
  • [API] RequestDelegateFactory.Create RequestDelegate overload #46024
  • `IHostBuilder` does not respect `SuppressStatusMessages` for WebHost #46022
  • HTTP Error 500.31 is rather unhelpful #46021
  • Perf improvement: plaintext, stage1vanilla #46019
  • Question: Does Blazor Identity work inside an iframe? #46017
  • No warning / error message when ASP.Net Core 7 containerized application used the wrong Kestrel endpoint cert password #46016
  • [AOT] Remove usage of System.Linq.Expressions #46014

Closed

  • Add tag trough OutputCacheAttribute #45842
  • Perf improvement: json #45974
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #46005
  • Electron will be disconnected frequently when using signlar #45990
  • Perf improvement: json #46004
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.SqlServer AddDistributedSqlServerCache add IServiceProvider support #45762

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Remove legacy check to fix Runtime SiteExtension #46045
    area-runtime
  • Increase experimental version #46043
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Mark API as shipped #46042
    tell-mode
  • Allow minimal host to be created without default HostBuilder behavior #46040
    area-runtime
  • Add IRateLimiterStatisticsFeature with default implementation and tests #46028
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [AOT] Add expression free request filter pipeline for RequestDelegate #46020
    area-web-frameworks
  • [AOT] Remove AOT warning suppressions #46015
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Remove legacy check to fix Runtime SiteExtension #46033
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • Use Arcade's DownloadFiles task #46039
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Update downlevel SiteExtensions versions #46041
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Backport deletion of playwright tests #45852
    tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Fix support for parameter names sourced from attributes (#45572) #45591
    Servicing-approved, area-web-frameworks
  • Move to latest .NET SDK #45983
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Update Selenium Java driver version #46018
    8.0-preview1
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #46007
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #46006
    6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] gRPC JSON transcoding: Support deserializing non-nested enum from string #45411
    Servicing-approved, area-grpc, 7.0.3
  • Add throw helpers to more multi-targeted projects #45984
    8.0-preview1
  • Add Tags property to OutputCache property. #45843
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Don't check in blazor.*.js files #45883
    area-blazor
  • Fix DefaultProblemDetailsWriter polymorphism #45906
    area-web-frameworks
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1 #46009
    3.1.x
  • Get EmptyHttpResult in RDF via reflection #45878
    area-runtime
  • Modernize Redis distributed cache #45735
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2083484 #45630
    area-mvc, * NO MERGE *
  • consider escaped commas in LDAP distinguished name #45649
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Added copy parameters to enable parallel build #45779
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Adding EnsureJsonTrimmability switch #45886
  • Update DeflateDecompressionProvider to use ZLibStream instead of DeflateStream #45836
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Bump json5 from 2.2.1 to 2.2.3 in /src/Components/Web.JS #45864
    area-blazor, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • Improve Win bundle installers' UI #45935
    area-infrastructure, feature-installers
  • Bump json5 from 2.2.1 to 2.2.3 in /src/Components/CustomElements/src/js #45953
    area-blazor, * NO MERGE *, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • Bump json5 from 2.2.1 to 2.2.3 in /src/SignalR/clients/ts/common #45966
    area-signalr, * NO MERGE *, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • Bump json5 from 2.2.1 to 2.2.3 in /src/Components/WebAssembly/Authentication.Msal/src/Interop #45977
    area-blazor, * NO MERGE *, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • Bump json5 from 2.2.1 to 2.2.3 in /src/Components/WebAssembly/WebAssembly.Authentication/src/Interop #45978
    area-blazor, * NO MERGE *, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • Call CloseAsync instead of CloseOutputAsync in the browser #46012
    area-signalr, signalr-client-net
  • [release/7.0] [SignalR] Avoid Http2 when negotiate auth is used #46013
    Servicing-consider, area-signalr, 7.0.x
  • Caching.StackExchangeRedis: add "force reconnect" pattern #45261
